short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A extension that beautify your Ctrl+V to help you read/translate

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing <Better Translate>, a simple yet powerful tool that makes copying and pasting text a breeze. It's designed to clean up your clipboard content, making it look neat and easy to read. With just one click, you can turn messy text into something clear and beautiful, perfect for reading or translating.

Our extension comes with easy-to-use features that you can turn on or off whenever you like. It gets rid of all the extra spaces and lines that you don't need, making your text easier to understand and work with. Whether you're studying, working, or just browsing the web, our tool is here to make your life easier.

Get ready to enjoy a cleaner, simpler way to handle text. Give our Chrome extension a try and see the difference it makes in your daily online activities.
